name: Coot's King!
description:
Made for Ludwigs 2023 Game Jam

I have never played Jump King but found myself mesmerized by ludwigs skillful playing in a race he did a while back. I decided to try and recreate the game but with little coots as the lead! Good luck in this terrible, rage inducing mess of a game.

The bugs aren't a flaw, they're a feature ;)

Downloadable version coming soon

Controls: Jump left and right by holding space and either A or D

Hold "O" to see the options

SaveState controls:

There is an added savestate system I made to make the game more accessible. 

  • Use Shift and 5 to Save
  • Use Shift and 3 to Load
  • Use Shift and 7 to Undo last save point
